body: IF ONLY MC & FMC move out to different school after being treated like that by thr bad teacer, the story will be different. Well it's hentai logic afterall and that will not happen 😂

The story is about the MC being a delusional getting cucked 🤣

@Zikakuto yes, it's all dream. Check the last pages . The Marriage names not listed which means it likely the MC will have a marriage with FMC

@Zikakuto not sure how you'd let it go if the person who cucked you kept sending you videos of him fucking the girl you love. While the girl keeps treating you pretty much the same except she no longer lovingly follows you around...

Oh so halfway through she decides that she wants to be with sensei. She doesn’t want to be with MC. Of course since this is NTR, we still got to see the MC being made to feel despair. He can’t just move on. Ending is her and sensei getting married. There’s the marriage attendance form after all. Though honestly, her showing up to walk with him to school like everything is normal is just so terrible. Like let the guy move on. I like NTR, and not too many NTRs really affect me, but this one did somewhat.
@Reyes too bad the author didn't like that ending and kept going with the story to destroy that character at the end.
Is it just me or did NTR just stopped being a fetish for a certain group of people, and more a virus to turn every man into a cuck?

I was bewildered on that last 3 panels fo the gfinal chap with mc waking up thinking if all of that was just a dream, so I decided to read the translated chapter 1 of the series which also began with MC waking up in a bad dream. My conclusion is this might really be just mc's dream since it doesn't really make sense for those 3 last panels to appear in the finale.
